fruits.name: Apple
fruits.description: Apples are crisp and juicy. They come in various shades of red, green, and yellow. They are widely used in pies, salads, and snacks.

fruits.name: Banana
fruits.description: Bananas are elongated and typically yellow when ripe. They are rich in potassium and are a popular choice for a quick, healthy snack.

fruits.name: Orange
fruits.description: Oranges are citrus fruits known for their tangy and sweet flavor. They are a great source of vitamin C and are commonly consumed as fresh fruit or in juices.

fruits.name: Grapes
fruits.description: Grapes grow in clusters and come in various colors like purple, green, red, or black. They are used for making wines, juices, and eaten as a fresh snack.
